name: Master File - Charge Description
description: Master file updates for billing charge descriptions, procedure codes, and revenue cycle reference data
hl7Reference: HL7 v2.3 Chapter 8 Master Files - HL7.eu/HL7v2x/v23/std23
businessPurpose: Synchronize charge description master data across billing systems to ensure accurate revenue cycle processing
timing: Sent when charge codes change, including new procedures, fee updates, or billing rule modifications
standardNotes: M04 handles charge description master file updates for billing and revenue cycle systems
CDM segment contains charge description and billing code information
PRC segment provides pricing and cost information for procedures
Essential for maintaining accurate billing and compliance with fee schedules
Updates must be coordinated with payer contract terms and regulatory requirements
realWorldScenarios: New CPT codes added to billing system for current year updates
Facility fees adjusted for outpatient procedure pricing changes
Emergency department charge descriptions updated for new triage protocols
Surgery center adds new minimally invasive procedure to charge master
Hospital updates room and board charges for different service levels
Physician practice modifies consultation fees per insurance contract updates

generationRules.requiredDataQuality: Critical - charge accuracy affects revenue integrity, compliance, and payer relationships
